Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: White House Business Centre is located in Kingswood, a suburb to the east of Bristol.  The Property is located on the corner of Douglas Road, a mixed use area with the office, industrial and residential occupiers all within close proximity and Kingswood High Street located within a 5 minute walk.  The property is located approximately 1.6 miles from the A174 ring road which leads directly to the A4, M32 and the National Road Network.  The two-storey detached office building consists of rendered elevations under a pitched roof.  The building is occupied by multiple tenants including Western Blueprint Limited, Human Support Group and Back 2 Front UK.

address.Common.Line1: Spark One Bristol & Bath Science Park

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Spark One Bristol & Bath Science Park

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: Spark One Bristol & Bath Science Park

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Spark One Bristol & Bath Science Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Bristol and Bath Science Park is a world-class environment that provides the space, flexibility and support for science and technology businesses to accelerate their growth and success. Situated in Emersons Green, the Park is just 2.5 miles from the M32 which links directly to Bristol city centre and the M4/M5 motorways. Parkway mainline station is just 6 miles to the south west, with a regular journey time to London of 1 hour 30 minutes. The Park is also situated on the Cities Metro bus network providing fast links to UWE and the City Centre. In addition, there is a nearby district centre offering a range of shops, with a hotel and various restaurants/pubs within walking distance.

The BBSP One building is split into two wings, connected via the central Hub which provides a large collaboration area along with Friska café allowing companies to interact, network, attend events and provides a high-quality working environment which goes a long way to attracting talent. Externally, the park provides table tennis tables and green space to relax in. There is car parking for approximately 200 car and there are 9 electric charging points.

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: BRISTOL AND BATH SCIENCE PARK - MAIN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Bristol Business Park is located approximately five miles north east of the city centre and adjacent to the Avon Ring Road (A4174). Motorway connections are excellent with Junction 1 of the M32 less than one mile away connecting the city centre with the M4 motorway at Junction 19. Bristol Business Park is located 1.5 miles from Bristol Parkway mainline railway station which provides regular direct services to London Paddington in 1 hour 20 minutes and Cardiff in 40 minutes and there is a regular bus service connecting the station with Coldharbour Lane.

The building comprises a detached modern open plan office with ground floor reception and 41 on site car spaces offering excellent ratio of 1:180 sq. ft.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Self Contained Office Space To Let

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The building is situated in the Stoke Gifford area of Bristol just off the A4174 ring road which provides direct access to the M32, the national motorway network and Bristol city centre which is approx. 7 miles to the south. Amenities in the local area include a Sainsbury’s store with petrol station, a Holiday Inn Express and the Abbey Wood Shopping Park has a range of restaurants including a Frankie & Bennys, Bella Italia and Nandos. Other occupiers in the area include MOD Procurement at Abbey Wood, UWE, Rolls Royce and Airbus. Bristol Parkway train station is immediately adjacent and has direct trains to London Paddington, Bristol, Birmingham and Cardiff. The Briery Furlong is situated in its own landscaped grounds and benefits from an impressive full height reception. On site amenity is provided including children’s daycare facility, restaurant, gym, squash court and sports hall. The building also benefits from cycle parking and shower/changing facilities.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: THE AVIVA CENTRE_ BRIERLY FURLONG_ STOKE GIFFORD_ BRISTOL

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: THE AVIVA CENTRE_ BRIERLY FURLONG_ STOKE GIFFORD_ BRISTOL

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: 1500 PARKWAY NORTH_ GREAT STOKE WAY_ BRISTOL - FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Parkway North is an established and high quality landscaped office park in the Stoke Gifford area. The park itself is located just off Great Stoke Way which provides direct access to the M32 and junction 19 of the M4 via the new Stoke Gifford bypass and Filton Road. Bristol Parkway Rail Station is within close proximity and offers regular train services to London Paddington. Occupiers on the park include Handelsbanken, ISG, NHS and Gleeds. Building 1500 is a detached 2 storey office building with double height main reception area. The available accommodation comprises the ground floor benefiting from a high quality fit out. The suite is available on a new effectively full repairing and insuring lease by way of a service charge for a term to be agreed. Service Charge details are available from the agents.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Ground Floor Letting In Established Business Park

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: AZTEC CENTRE_ AZTEC WEST_ ALMONDSBURY 2ND SW FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Aztec West is situated adjacent to junction 16 of the M5 and 1 mile from the M4/M5 interchange, Bristol City Centre is approximately 6.5 miles to the south. Bristol Parkway main line rail station is only approximately 2.5 miles to the south east and is served by regular bus services. The Aztec Centre is situated in the most prominent location on Aztec West Business Park which is viewed as Bristol's premier Business Park location. The building benefits from a number of on site amenities including sandwich and coffee shops, newsagent. The Aztec Hotel which has conference facilities, health club and restaurant. Additionally, the Lodge on the Park hotel includes a Starbucks Coffee Shop. Other occupiers on the park include EE, Atkins, GE Capital, Regus, Broadcom, Aardman Animations and LV Insurance.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office Space Availability On Prominent Bristol Business Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Building 2630 is located on Waterside Drive which is located off Park Avenue on the Aztec West Business Park. Aztec West is an established park situated adjacent to the M4/M5 interchange and is widely acknowledged as Bristol and the South West’s premier business park location. Bristol city centre is approximately 7 miles to the south and junction 16 of the M5 is approximately 5 minutes’ drive and is accessed via the A38. Bristol Parkway station is located approximately 3.5 miles to the east via Bradley Stoke Way. There are a wide range of facilities in the local area with a range of retail outlets in the Aztec Centre including newsagents and sandwich bar. There are also conference and restaurant facilities within the Aztec Hotel and a Starbucks coffee shop on the park. Location Terms 

Building 2630 is a high-quality office building with full height atrium reception, large open plan floor plates and offers 226 on site car spaces. The accommodation is available either as a whole or floor by floor on a sublease expiring January 2023 or alternatively a new lease for a term to be agreed directly via the Landlord.

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: GREAT PARK COURT_ BRISTOL_ BLDG1 FLOORPLAN
GREAT PARK COURT_ BRISTOL_ BLDG2 FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Great Park Court is a high quality development of 2 detached office buildings in an attractive landscaped environment situated within the popular Almondsbury Business Park. The available accommodation comprises 2 buildings arranged over ground and first floors with brick elevations under a pitched tiled roof and a mix of surface and undercroft car parking. There are a total of 96 on site car spaces which equates to an excellent overall ratio of 1:190 sq ft net internal.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Two Self Contained Office Buildings To Let
